message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $140 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer you the product for $135. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $135. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product.

I've made a lot of concessions already, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $140. If you're still interested, I'd be willing to meet you at $132.50. That's as close as I can get to your offer without going below my minimum.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $132.50, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product.
